CmdLine: apt-get update -qq &&   apt-get install -qy --no-install-recommends     libfuse2     openbox     python-xdg     x11-xserver-utils     xbase-clients     xfonts-100dpi     xfonts-75dpi     xfonts-base     xkb-data &&   curl -L https://dl.bintray.com/tigervnc/stable/tigervnc-1.7.1.x86_64.tar.gz | tar -xz --strip=1 -C / &&   mkdir -p /opt/vncpasswd &&   curl -L https://github.com/trinitronx/vncpasswd.py/archive/master.tar.gz | tar -zx --strip=1 -C /opt/vncpasswd &&   apt-get autoremove -y &&   apt-get clean -y &&   rm -rf /tmp/* /var/tmp/* /var/lib/apt/lists/* /var/cache/*
Commands.Name: run
